location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Sir Evan Nepean, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter discusses the visit to Bushire of Shaik Abrahim iben Abdil Karim, envoy of the Wahabee [Wahabi] Chief. Bruce reports that the Wahabee Chief is anxious to enter into terms of friendship with the British Government.
